clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Elderly Patients With Cancer and Seen in Consultation of Geriatric Oncology in the Nord Pas-de-Calais (CONSOG).
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Elderly Patients With Cancer and Seen in Consultation of Geriatric Oncology in the Nord Pas-de-Calais (CONSOG).

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to establish a common geriatric oncology medical database. The patients concerned are the patients having benefited from a geriatric oncology consultation in one of the participating centres. This database is designed with a view on the one hand to better describe to better understand this population and on the other hand to facilitate the conduct of future retrospective or prospective studies on this population. The constitution of this observatory of patients seen in consultation should facilitate the development of studies from the analysis of data collected, and occasional surveys by the rapid identification of cases. Data from this database could provide clinicians with valuable informative elements of descriptive epidemiology and concerning the organization of care in the geriatric oncology field.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is presented during the first consultation of oncogeriatric care or after this consultation (for patients having benefited from the consultation between January 2014 and October 2014) : the patient is informed with an information note and is told that he can express its opposition to the use of its clinical data. In case of no opposition from the patient, the referent geriatrician will complete the patient form with the requested data and will forward it for computerized processing.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of the prevalence of different clinical criteria of interest : demographic characteristics, disease state, patient status according to the geriatric criteria (Comprehensive Geriatric Assessment (CGA)).

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of the prevalence of different medical and social criteria of interest.
secondary_outcome.description: Patient's life characteristics (place of living, isolation) and the helps set up (presence of a natural caregiver, sources of professional help).

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of the association between one or more factors of interest (clinical, biological and medical and social) related to a proposal to amend or not the initially proposed therapeutic strategy.
Percentage of patients included in trials.
Temporal evolutions of clinical, medical and social characteristics.

study_pop.textblock: Patients included are patients followed in one of the participating centres and not opposing the use of their medical data.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient seen in consultation of geriatric oncology in one of the participating centres in Nord Pas-de-Calais.
- Age ≥ 65 years
- Patient having been informed and not opposing the computerized processing of its data.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient having opposed the use of its medical data.
